Package Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
Client.Client
public class Client extends Object
Client class that provides the client-side functionality for a general store application. This application allows users to connect to a server, login, sign up, and interact with products.

  • Method Details

    • handleLogin

      public static void handleLogin(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output, Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Handles the login process for users. Prompts for email and password, validates input, and communicates with the server to authenticate the user.
      Parameters:
      input - the DataInputStream for receiving data from the server
      output - the DataOutputStream for sending data to the server
      scanner - the Scanner for user input
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error while obtaining input and output streams.

    • handleSignUp

      public static void handleSignUp(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output, Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Handles the sign-up process for new users. Collects user details, validates input, and sends data to the server for account creation.
      Parameters:
      input - the DataInputStream for receiving data from the server
      output - the DataOutputStream for sending data to the server
      scanner - the Scanner for user input
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error while obtaining input and output streams.

    • ViewProduct

      public static void ViewProduct(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output, Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays the list of available products retrieved from the server.
      Parameters:
      input - the DataInputStream to receive data from the server
      output - the DataOutputStream to send data to the server
      scanner - the Scanner to read user input
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while communicating with the server

    • ViewPurchases

      public static void ViewPurchases(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output, Scanner scanner, Customer customer) throws IOException
      Displays the list of purchases made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      input - the DataInputStream to receive data from the server
      output - the DataOutputStream to send data to the server
      scanner - the Scanner to read user input
      customer - the Customer whose purchase history is being retrieved
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while communicating with the server

    • ViewSuggestedProducts

      output - the DataOutputStream to send data to the server

      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while communicating with the server

    • BuyProduct

      public static void BuyProduct(DataInputStream input, DataOutputStream output, Scanner scanner, Customer customer) throws IOException
      Allows the customer to buy a product by providing its name and quantity.
      Parameters:
      input - the DataInputStream to receive data from the server
      output - the DataOutputStream to send data to the server
      scanner - the Scanner to read user input
      customer - the Customer making the purchase
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while communicating with the server

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the client application. It establishes a connection to the server, handles user input, and facilitates interactions with the server.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used in this application)
